languages.text: {n}С момента, как вы сели за стол, взгляд Кибеллы направлен мимо вас. Ее новообретенные манеры не теряют в изысканности, однако неожиданно напоминают вам о марионетках, приводимых в движение нитями кукловода.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Если на каунтере Synchronicity три очка

traits.locale_text: {n}С того момента, как вы сели за стол, взгляд Кибеллы направлен мимо вас. Ее новообретенные манеры и жесты не теряют в изысканности и грациозности, однако движения культистски неожиданно начинают напоминать вам о марионетках, приводимых в движение нитками кукловода. Однако когда она поднимает на вас взгляд, в лице нет и намека на неловкость.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: Если на каунтере Synchronicity три очка

languages.text: {n}Ever since you sat down at the table, Kibellah's gaze has been directed past you. Her newly discovered manners are just as refined as before, while suddenly resembling the movements of a marionette.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С момента, как вы сели за стол, взгляд Кибеллы направлен мимо вас. Ее новообретенные манеры не теряют в изысканности, однако неожиданно напоминают вам о марионетках, приводимых в движение нитями кукловода.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ever since you sat down at the table, Kibellah's gaze has been directed past you. Her newly discovered manners are just as refined as before, but suddenly seem reminiscent of the movements of a marionette.{/n}

{n}Ever since you sat down at the table, Kibellah's gaze has been directed past you. Her newly discovered manners are just as refined as before, while suddenly resembling the movements of a marionette.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Seit du dich an den Tisch gesetzt hast, geht Kibellahs Blick an dir vorbei. Ihre neu entdecken Manieren sind so kultiviert wie zuvor, ähneln jedoch plötzlich den Bewegungen einer Marionette.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ever since you sat down at the table, Kibellah's gaze has been directed past you. Her newly discovered manners are just as refined as before, while suddenly resembling the movements of a marionette.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Seit du dich an den Tisch gesetzt hast, geht Kibellahs Blick an dir vorbei. Ihre neu entdecken Manieren sind so kultiviert wie zuvor, ähneln jedoch plötzlich den Bewegungen einer Marionette.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Desde que os sentasteis a la mesa, la mirada de Kibellah ha estado perdida. Sus modales recién descubiertos son tan refinados como antes, pero sus movimientos se asemejan a los de una marioneta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ever since you sat down at the table, Kibellah's gaze has been directed past you. Her newly discovered manners are just as refined as before, while suddenly resembling the movements of a marionette.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Desde que os sentasteis a la mesa, la mirada de Kibellah ha estado perdida. Sus modales recién descubiertos son tan refinados como antes, pero sus movimientos se asemejan a los de una marioneta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}テーブルに着いてからというもの、キベラの視線はずっとあなたに向けられていた。彼女が新たに身につけた所作は、依然と同様に洗練されているもの、時折唐突にマリオネットの動きめくことがある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ever since you sat down at the table, Kibellah's gaze has been directed past you. Her newly discovered manners are just as refined as before, while suddenly resembling the movements of a marionette.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}テーブルに着いてからというもの、キベラの視線はずっとあなたに向けられていた。彼女が新たに身につけた所作は、依然と同様に洗練されているもの、時折唐突にマリオネットの動きめくことがある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}自从你们在桌边坐下之后，绮贝菈的目光就始终盯着你。尽管她的举止依然充满优雅，但不只为何，她的动作变得变得像木偶一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ever since you sat down at the table, Kibellah's gaze has been directed past you. Her newly discovered manners are just as refined as before, while suddenly resembling the movements of a marionette.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}自从你们在桌边坐下之后，绮贝菈的目光就始终盯着你。尽管她的举止依然充满优雅，但不只为何，她的动作变得变得像木偶一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Depuis que vous avez pris place à table, le regard de Kibellah semble comme perdu à l'horizon. Bien que toujours aussi raffinées, ses manières ne sont pas sans vous rappeler les mouvements d'une marionnette.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ever since you sat down at the table, Kibellah's gaze has been directed past you. Her newly discovered manners are just as refined as before, while suddenly resembling the movements of a marionette.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Depuis que vous avez pris place à table, le regard de Kibellah semble comme perdu à l'horizon. Bien que toujours aussi raffinées, ses manières ne sont pas sans vous rappeler les mouvements d'une marionnette.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın bakışları, masaya oturmanla birlikte senden öteye odaklanıyor. Yeni keşfettiği hareket tarzı, eskisi kadar zarif olsa da aniden bir kuklanın hareketlerini andırmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ever since you sat down at the table, Kibellah's gaze has been directed past you. Her newly discovered manners are just as refined as before, while suddenly resembling the movements of a marionette.{/n}
